otupy.core.extensions.Extensions

Extensions = {'Actuators': {'slpf': <class 'otupy.profiles.slpf.actuator.Specifiers'>, 'x-ctxd': <class 'otupy.profiles.ctxd.actuator.Specifiers'>, 'x-dumb': <class 'otupy.profiles.dumb.actuator.dumb'>}, 'Args': {'slpf': <class 'otupy.profiles.slpf.args.Args'>, 'x-ctxd': <class 'otupy.profiles.ctxd.args.Args'>}, 'Profile': {'slpf': <class 'otupy.profiles.slpf.profile.Profile'>, 'x-ctxd': <class 'otupy.profiles.ctxd.profile.Profile'>, 'x-dumb': <class 'otupy.profiles.dumb.profile.Profile'>}, 'Results': {'slpf': <class 'otupy.profiles.slpf.results.Results'>, 'x-ctxd': <class 'otupy.profiles.ctxd.results.Results'>}, 'Targets': {'artifact': <class 'otupy.types.targets.artifact.Artifact'>, 'command': <class 'otupy.types.targets.command_id.CommandID'>, 'device': <class 'otupy.types.targets.device.Device'>, 'domain_name': <class 'otupy.types.targets.domain_name.DomainName'>, 'email_addr': <class 'otupy.types.targets.email_addr.EmailAddr'>, 'features': <class 'otupy.types.targets.features.Features'>, 'file': <class 'otupy.types.targets.file.File'>, 'idn_domain_name': <class 'otupy.types.targets.idn_domain_name.IDNDomainName'>, 'idn_email_addr': <class 'otupy.types.targets.idn_email_addr.IDNEmailAddr'>, 'ipv4_connection': <class 'otupy.types.targets.ipv4_connection.IPv4Connection'>, 'ipv4_net': <class 'otupy.types.targets.ipv4_net.IPv4Net'>, 'ipv6_connection': <class 'otupy.types.targets.ipv6_connection.IPv6Connection'>, 'ipv6_net': <class 'otupy.types.targets.ipv6_net.IPv6Net'>, 'iri': <class 'otupy.types.targets.iri.IRI'>, 'mac_addr': <class 'otupy.types.targets.mac_addr.MACAddr'>, 'process': <class 'otupy.types.targets.process.Process'>, 'properties': <class 'otupy.types.targets.properties.Properties'>, 'slpf:rule_number': <class 'otupy.profiles.slpf.targets.rule_id.RuleID'>, 'uri': <class 'otupy.types.targets.uri.URI'>, 'x-ctxd:context': <class 'otupy.profiles.ctxd.targets.context.Context'>}}

Extensions

This is the registry that keeps track of all extensions to the core otupy data and structures.
